for_sales.sales_text:
This is a fine example of the Oystercatcher gaff cutter.

Currently in commission Saltash Cornwall.

Engine: Yanmar 1GM 10. 12 litre fuel tank.

Electrics: 12 Volt battery (2023). Tri-light. Garmin 276c Chart Plotter (2023). Lowrance Depth Sounder (2022). Icomm Handheld VHF (with charging mounts). Automatic bilge pump. Simpson Lawrence Heads. Top Up Solar panel. 4 wheel ‘piggy back’ trailer with electric winch, 2 spare wheels, wheel lock, towing straps and lightboard. Inventory includes: Beaching Legs, Boom crutches, Silva compass, Odeo flare, fire extinguisher, torch, two burner meths stove, anchor chain and warp, 3 warps and fenders, First Aid kit, Manual bilge pump, spare impeller and bolts, Spare fuel can. All over winter cover, supports and mast bag.

Since 2022 the current owner has extensively refitted the boat including:

Hull polish and wax after repairing the usual minor crazing to gelcoat. 2022 All standing rigging, mast sleeved at wear points 2023 All running rigging Replaced ill fitted sheet leads and jammers with tuffnol fittings. 2023 sail cover, cockpit pouches, anchor bag, ‘over hatch cover’, tiller cover Jib and staysail new luf f wires and UV protection. Coach roof mounted cleats for jib and staysail furlers. New starter motor (2024), battery (2023), decompression lever and ‘water oil’ seal. Various blue canvas pouches internally for storage, modesty curtain, halyard bag on foredeck. 2 x beige holdalls.

boat.name: Roxanne
boat.short_description: She is a fine example of her type.
